channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Mac Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Mac Login

item.title: CVE-2021-41995|2024-08-04T03:22:25.641Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20mac%20login
item.description: A misconfiguration of RSA in PingID Mac Login prior to 1.1 is vulnerable to pre-computed dictionary attacks, leading to an offline MFA bypass.
